# [Interview #1182: Harold Washington Library Center-AU Tour, Entry #54](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1182#54)

#### Question

Are there a specific reason why opposite Shards tend to end up in the same system?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yep.
